channel.title: Controllers on Densha de GO! controller documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Controllers on Densha de GO! controller documentation

item.title: Classic consoles
item.description: Classic console controllers This section includes controllers for consoles which use a non-USB connector and usually pose as standard controllers from their corresponding console.

item.title: Game port
item.description: Game port controllers This section includes controllers for Microsoft Windows which use a game port.

item.title: Nintendo Wii
item.description: Wii controllers This section includes controllers for the Nintendo Wii which use a Wii expansion cable and connect to a Wiimote’s extension port.

item.title: Serial port
item.description: Serial port controllers This section includes controllers for Microsoft Windows which use a DE-9 serial port.

item.title: Standalone
item.description: Standalone controllers This section includes self-contained controllers with software included in them. Instead of connecting to a PC or console, they can be connected directly to a TV via HDMI.

item.title: USB
item.description: USB controllers This section includes controllers for Microsoft Windows and consoles which use a USB-A connector.
